an5.264:3.1: 264 Another Discourse on the First Absorption
an5.264:4.1: “Mendicants, without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.264:4.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.
an5.264:4.4: Without giving up these five qualities you can’t enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.264:5.1: But after giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.
an5.264:5.3: Stinginess with dwellings, families, material possessions, praise, and lack of gratitude and thankfulness.
an5.264:5.4: After giving up these five qualities you can enter and remain in the first absorption.”
